definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The goalkeeper just managed to palm the ball over the crossbar.
sentences.chinese: 守門員用手掌勉強把球擋過球門橫木。

sentences.english: And they shall be put along by the midst of the boards from one end to the other.
sentences.chinese: 在木板中間的那根橫木，應從這頭穿到那頭。

sentences.english: It keeps the pressure of a ladder-round.
sentences.chinese: 仍感受著梯子橫木的壓力。

sentences.english: A Latin cross having two horizontal bars, of which the upper is the shorter.
sentences.chinese: 縱長十字架，具有兩根橫木，上面的一根較短。

sentences.english: There was a bird . it was an old bird which sat on its perch all day.
sentences.chinese: 這是一隻很老的鳥，整天就棲息在它的橫木上。

sentences.english: He made also bars of setim wood, five to hold together the boards of one side of the tabernacle.
sentences.chinese: 又用皂莢木做了橫木爲帳棚這一面木板做了五根。

sentences.english: He whispered to the parrot, "Now get out." But he was very surprised that the parrot was clinging to the bars of the cage.
sentences.chinese: 但是令他喫驚的是這隻鸚鵡竟抓着鳥籠的橫木不放。

sentences.english: I jump from the cross-beams and seize the clover and timothy.
sentences.chinese: 我從橫木上跳下來，揪住了苜蓿和貓尾草。

sentences.english: He made also another bar, that might come by the midst of the boards from corner to corner.
sentences.chinese: 又做了木板中間的那根橫木，從這頭穿到那頭。

sentences.english: "HengPi" stuck on the door the crossbar of mei.
Heddles will be bound between another horizontal bar and warps.
sentences.chinese: 綜線將被纏繞在另一個橫木和經線之間。

sentences.english: The sailor were nailed on the rail for he failed to trail the mail.
sentences.chinese: 水手被釘在橫木上，由於他未能跟蹤郵件。

sentences.english: But he was very surprised that the parrot was clinging to the bars of the cage.
sentences.chinese: 可是令他受驚的是這隻鸚鵡竟抓着鳥籠的橫木不放。

definition: caterpillar track (propulsion system used on bulldozers etc)/(literary) shoes and belt
the beam of a steelyard/a balance arm
variant of 車廂|车厢[che1 xiang1]
